entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 05 February 2023
